report.title: Species names
report.description: Report used to retrieve names for a taxon.
report.query: select distinct cttl.id, cttl.taxon_meaning_id, cttl.external_key, cttl.default_common_name, cttl.taxon as taxon_plain, case cttl.language_iso when 'lat' then '' || cttl.taxon || '' || coalesce(' ' || cttl.authority, '') else cttl.taxon end, cttl.language_iso, cttl.language_iso='lat' as latin, cttl.preferred from cache_taxa_taxon_lists t join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.taxon_meaning_id=t.taxon_meaning_id where cttl.taxon_list_id = 251

order_bys.order_by: cttl.preferred desc, cttl.language_iso='lat' desc, cttl.language_iso desc, cttl.id asc

param.name: taxa_taxon_list_id
param.description: Taxa_taxon_list_id of the taxon to load

param.name: taxon_meaning_id
param.description: Taxon meaning ID of the taxon to load. Provide this OR the taxa taxon list ID OR the external key.

param.name: external_key
param.description: Taxon meaning ID of the taxon to load. Provide this (tvk) OR the taxa taxon list ID OR the taxon meaning ID.
